author: Joe Flint
title: Netflix Signs Producer Ryan Murphy to Multimillion-Dollar Deal
text:
In the latest sign of the escalating battle for talent in the entertainment industry, Netflix Inc. signed producer Ryan Murphy to a multiyear, multimillion-dollar deal to create content exclusively for the streaming service starting this July.
Terms of the pact werenâ€™t disclosed, but people familiar with the matter said the production agreement runs for five years and has an estimated value of $300 million. Mr. Murphy is currently based at 21st Century Fox Inc., which bid aggressively to retain his services as he has created...
